H0.text: what language do people from the uk speak. English

H1.text: what language do people from the uk speak. Scottish Gaelic

H2.text: what language do people from the uk speak. Welsh

H3.text: what language do people from the uk speak. Irish

A4.text: English is the most widely spoken and de facto official language of the United Kingdom.

A5.text: Welsh is spoken by 538,300 people in Wales according to the 2021 census.

A6.text: In the 2022 census of Scotland, it was found that 2.5% of the Scottish population had some skills in Gaelic, or 130,161 persons.

A7.text: In 2022, the census showed that 3,551 people recorded Gaelic as their 'main language'.
